resources.string: \u2022Your operating system is the wrong version. Are you using an approved phone?\n
\u2022Turn on airplane mode in settings. (This must be done manually)\n
\u2022Disconnect from the WiFi network you\'re connected to\n
\u2022Make sure your WiFi Direct name is in the form ####-DS or ####-RC (for example, 9277-RC or 10650-DS) (This must be done manually)\n
\u2022Install all required apps. The Driver Station and Channel Changer can be installed from the Play Store. The Robot Controller app is installed from your programming computer. \n
\u2022You have both the Robot Controller and the Driver Station installed. Delete one from this phone. \n
\u2022You\'re missing the Channel Changer app. While this isn\'t required by FIRST, it\'s strongly recommended to have. \n
\nWe found errors, but we can try to fix some automatically. Would you like us to try?
